cn.description:
欢迎来到Vostok - 你的终极故事编辑器和拼贴制作工具，旨在提升你在社交媒体上的存在感！Vostok可以轻松将你的创意转化为令人惊叹的专业级帖子和故事。

无论你是博主、摄影师，还是喜欢在社交媒体上记录生活点滴的人，Vostok都为你提供了一切所需，打造引人注目的内容。我们时尚且用户友好的应用巧妙地融合了你对摄影和讲故事的热爱，为你提供了一个动态的平台，展示你的惊奇时刻。

Vostok以极简主义风格自豪，成为你释放创意的完美空间。多种模板、贴纸和特效尽在指尖，让你打造独特的故事，展现个性。

但Vostok不仅提供创意自由，更注重简便性。我们直观的界面使得编辑和分享内容变得轻而易举，让你有更多时间专注于创作引人入胜的故事，让你的粉丝喜爱。

不要犹豫！立刻开始你的Vostok之旅，打造引人入胜的帖子和故事，留下深刻印象！

以下是我们的一些功能预览：

· 200+社交媒体设计模板
· 支持西里尔字母的独家字体
· 450+独特贴纸
· 照片大气灰尘和颗粒特效
· 多种背景：纸张纹理、大理石、渐变、颜色
· 无广告，无需订阅
· 支持深色模式

被Apple评为2019年最佳应用之一。

拥有200多个模板，Vostok是你打造出众社交媒体内容的工具箱。

我们热切期待你的想法和反馈。
通过hello@vostokapp.ru与我们联系，或在Instagram直接向我们发送消息，帐号为@vostokapp。

cn.description:
语音到文本：语音到文本是强大的实时听写解决方案。基于最新的人工智能并使用强大的语音识别引擎，此听写应用程序可将您的语音实时准确地转录为文本。

干净优雅的设计，加上不间断的语音识别和其他功能，让您可以放松并专注于您的想法和内容。

使用我们的应用程序，您的文字将被神奇地转录成文本，而无需您触摸键盘。现在你可以用你的声音来创造你的话语了！

稍后轻松共享您的文本和音频文件！ （适用于 Evernote、Dropbox、Google Drive、OneDrive、Facebook、Twitter、Snapchat、WhatsApp 和其他 iOS 支持的共享应用程序。）


无论您是专业作家、医生、律师、残疾人或因某种原因无法使用传统打字的人，语音转文本：语音转文本应用程序将迅速解决您的转录问题并帮助您实现今天的写作目标！



这款出色的语音转文本应用程序可让您使用 iPhone/iPad 做更多事情：

・更长的记录时间：
 - 连续听写最多 1 小时。

・无限制的保存和编辑

・可以直接编辑转录的文本。
・个人和团体转录的理想选择
・对语音识别的后台支持。
・设备上的语音识别。


• 语音识别支持 ​​59 种语言和口音。
• 在社交网络上分享您的文字。

cn.description:
- zFuse 可播放所有视频格式和编码, 您无需将视频文件转换为MP4, 即可在移动设备中进行播放.

- zFuse 支持ASS/SSA/SUP特效字幕, 您可以体验到与Mac/PC版完全相同的特效字幕效果.

- zFuse 具有强大的网络技术, 您无需将视频文件存储在空间有限的设备中, 可以直接播放电脑或NAS上的各种格式视频, 无需转换, 无需下载, 即点即播.

- zFuse 支持直接登录多种云盘, 直接原画播放内容, 还可以阅读云盘中的小说/图片/源代码/直播源等, 甚至可以通过iOS版同步到zFuse TV版, 让您在tvOS中播放云盘内容.

- zFuse 也可以让您轻松地从电脑/NAS中直接下载文件/文件夹, 是您旅途中的最佳伴侣.

- zFuse 支持各种手势操作, 只需动动手指, 即可调整播放位置, 字体大小, 控制音量和亮度.

- zFuse 为您的隐私安全考虑, 拥有文件夹加密功能, 让您不再担心隐私问题.

- zFuse 还为广大学子准备了音视频变速不变调功能, 帮助您快速浏览课件.

- zFuse 还包含了一款强大的代码/文本编辑器, 支持各种程序语言/语法高亮/数十种编辑器风格等, 您可以用它直接在iPhone/iPad上编辑代码.

- zFuse 甚至可以作为一款文件管理工具, 您可以用它压缩/解压缩/浏览图片/阅读TXT, PDF, EPUB等各种电子书.

- zFuse的详细特性如下:

    * SMB/CIFS播放/自动发现(轻松播放PC上的共享媒体文件).
    * 直接通过SMB/CIFS/DLNA/FTP/WebDAV下载媒体文件/文件夹到iOS设备上.
    * UPnP/DLNA播放/自动发现.
    * Emby和Jellyfin媒体服务器支持.
    * 客户端之间可以通过二维码分享媒体文件/文件夹.
    * 直接使用PC资源管理器管理媒体文件夹.
    * AirPlay投屏播放.
    * 支持画中画模式.
    * 支持iPad分屏多任务.
    * 硬件加速.
    * 支持HDR Tone Mapping以便在非HDR显示设备中显示HDR内容.
    * 支持特效字幕.
    * 0.5x-3.0x播放速度控制.
    * 0.5x-5.0x屏幕缩放.
    * 支持Seeking时预览媒体内容.
    * 内建音频增强.
    * 多音轨选择.
    * 内嵌/外挂字幕选择.
    * 字幕同步.
    * 音频同步.
    * 支持外部字幕字体选择.
    * 播放列表文件预览功能.
    * 播放蓝光文件夹功能.
    * 直接在设备上管理和修改播放列表.
    * 直接播放外接U盘上的媒体文件.
    * 直播源有效性检测.
    * 屏幕镜像.

    * 文件管理:
        - 删除, 移动, 重命名, 创建文件夹.
        - 支持Wi-Fi传输, 无需连接USB线即可传输文件.
        - 支持创建流媒体播放列表.
        - 支持EPUB/TXT阅读器.
        - 支持解压缩常见压缩格式: 7z, zip, rar, tar, bz, bz2等.
        - 支持压缩常见格式: 7z, zip等.

    * 手势功能:
        - 水平拖动: 调整播放位置.
        - 在屏幕左侧竖直拖动: 调整音量.
        - 在屏幕右侧竖直拖动: 调整亮度.
        - 在屏幕上捏合: 屏幕尺寸调整.
        - 双击: 播放/暂停.
        - 两指双击: 切换屏幕高宽比.

    * 支持外接键盘:
        - 空格: 暂停/播放.
        - 左箭头: 快退.
        - 右箭头: 快进.
        - 上箭头: 增加音量.
        - 下箭头: 降低音量.
        - Esc: 退出播放.
        - S: 改变播放速度.
        - B: 上一首.
        - N: 下一首.
        - Z: 改变屏幕缩放.

    * 支持视频格式: MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WMV, FLV, RMVB, ASF, OGV, 蓝光ISO等所有常见格式.
    * 支持音频格式: MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, APE等.
    * 支持字幕格式: SRT, SSA, ASS, SUP, VTT等.
    * 支持图像格式: JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, GIF, HEIC等.
    * 支持电子书格式: EPUB, TXT, PDF.
    * 编辑器支持的语言格式: JSON, HTML, XML, C/C++, Lua, Java, Objective-C, Swift, Python, JavaScript.
    * 支持浏览的文档格式: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Numbers, Keynote, Pages, RTF, CSV.

hk.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

hk.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

hk.description:
建立足夠強大的骰子組合，淨化阿斯特賴亞失控的腐敗並拯救星系。

特色
• 獨特的雙重「傷害」系統：腐化與淨化——《阿斯特賴亞》有一種新型的「傷害」系統。淨化可以用來傷害敵人或治療自己，而腐化可以用來傷害自己或治療敵人。使用淨化來安撫敵人，或腐化自己來釋放力量以扭轉戰局。
• 動態生命條系統——將技能附加到生命條後，可以使用腐化來啟用這些技能並釋放強大的能力。但是要小心，如果接受了太多腐敗，你可能會被會被它消耗殆盡。
• 不是紙牌，是骰子！——建立適合你遊戲風格的骰子組合。從超過350顆骰子和三種骰子類型中選擇：可靠安全、完美平衡或強大有風險。以高風險、高報酬為核心設計的骰子型系統。
• 自訂骰子——編輯骰子面，以新動作來創造自己的命運，讓強大結果的機率對自己有利。
• 在六位勇敢神諭者中選擇——每一位都擁有自己獨特的骰子組合、能力與玩法風格。從靈巧的施法者到野蠻的狂戰士，無論是喜歡讓對手挨轟求饒，還是想以智取勝，總有一位適合你。
• 發現超過170種修改賜福——為神諭者注入獨特的被動技，產生強大的效果，將改變你的基本策略。在恆星賜福（力量較弱的被動效果）或黑洞賜福（具有不利條件的強大被動效果）之間進行選擇。

hk.description:
Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

hk.description:
Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:
 -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR.

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.
・Ideal for both individual and group transcription
・Background support for voice recognition.
・On-device Speech Recognition.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.
• Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly
• Text Analysis using AI.

►  Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokmål, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

Technology:
New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy,
Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio.

2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere.

3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen!

4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love.

5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app !

hk.description:
- zFuse 可播放所有影片格式和編碼, 您無需將影片檔案轉換為MP4, 即可在行動裝置中進行播放.

- zFuse 支援ASS/SSA/SUP特效字幕, 您可以體驗到與Mac/PC版完全相同的特效字幕效果.

- zFuse 具有強大的網路技術, 您無需將影片檔案儲存在空間有限的裝置中, 可以直接播放電腦或NAS上的各種格式影片, 無需轉換, 無需下載, 即點即播.

- zFuse 支援直接登入多種雲端硬碟, 直接原畫播放內容, 還可以閱讀雲端硬碟中的小說/圖片/原始碼/直播源等, 甚至可以透過iOS版同步到zFuse TV版, 讓您在tvOS中播放雲端硬碟內容.

- zFuse 也可以讓您輕鬆地從電腦/NAS中直接下載檔案/資料夾, 是您旅途中的最佳夥伴.

- zFuse 支援各種手勢操作, 只需動動手指, 即可調整播放位置, 字體大小, 控制音量和亮度.

- zFuse 為您的隱私安全考量, 擁有資料夾加密功能, 讓您不再擔心隱私問題.

- zFuse 還為廣大學子準備了音視頻變速不變調功能, 幫助您快速瀏覽課件.

- zFuse 還包含了一款強大的程式碼/文字編輯器, 支援各種程式語言/語法高亮/數十種編輯器風格等, 您可以用它直接在iPhone/iPad上編輯程式碼.

- zFuse 甚至可以作為一款檔案管理工具, 您可以用它壓縮/解壓縮/瀏覽圖片/閱讀TXT, PDF, EPUB等各種電子書.

- zFuse的詳細特性如下:

    * SMB/CIFS播放/自動發現(輕鬆播放PC上的共享媒體檔案).
    * 直接透過SMB/CIFS/DLNA/FTP/WebDAV下載媒體檔案/資料夾到iOS裝置上.
    * UPnP/DLNA播放/自動發現.
    * Emby和Jellyfin媒體伺服器支援.
    * 客戶端之間可以透過QR Code分享媒體檔案/資料夾.
    * 直接使用PC檔案總管管理媒體資料夾.
    * AirPlay投影播放.
    * 支援子母畫面模式.
    * 支援iPad分割畫面多工.
    * 硬體加速.
    * 支援HDR Tone Mapping以便在非HDR顯示裝置中顯示HDR內容.
    * 支援特效字幕.
    * 0.5x-3.0x播放速度控制.
    * 0.5x-5.0x螢幕縮放.
    * 支援Seeking時預覽媒體內容.
    * 內建音訊增強.
    * 多音軌選擇.
    * 內嵌/外掛字幕選擇.
    * 字幕同步.
    * 音訊同步.
    * 支援外部字幕字型選擇.
    * 播放清單檔案預覽功能.
    * 播放藍光資料夾功能.
    * 直接在裝置上管理和修改播放清單.
    * 直接播放外接USB隨身碟上的媒體檔案.
    * 直播源有效性檢測.
    * 螢幕鏡像.

    * 檔案管理:
        - 刪除, 移動, 重新命名, 建立資料夾.
        - 支援Wi-Fi傳輸, 無需連接USB線即可傳輸檔案.
        - 支援建立串流媒體播放清單.
        - 支援EPUB/TXT閱讀器.
        - 支援解壓縮常見壓縮格式: 7z, zip, rar, tar, bz, bz2等.
        - 支援壓縮常見格式: 7z, zip等.

    * 手勢功能:
        - 水平拖動: 調整播放位置.
        - 在螢幕左側垂直拖動: 調整音量.
        - 在螢幕右側垂直拖動: 調整亮度.
        - 在螢幕上捏合: 螢幕尺寸調整.
        - 雙擊: 播放/暫停.
        - 兩指雙擊: 切換螢幕長寬比.

    * 支援外接鍵盤:
        - 空白鍵: 暫停/播放.
        - 左方向鍵: 快退.
        - 右方向鍵: 快進.
        - 上方向鍵: 增加音量.
        - 下方向鍵: 降低音量.
        - Esc: 退出播放.
        - S: 改變播放速度.
        - B: 上一首.
        - N: 下一首.
        - Z: 改變螢幕縮放.

    * 支援影片格式: MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WMV, FLV, RMVB, ASF, OGV, 藍光ISO等所有常見格式.
    * 支援音訊格式: MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, APE等.
    * 支援字幕格式: SRT, SSA, ASS, SUP, VTT等.
    * 支援圖像格式: JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, GIF, HEIC等.
    * 支援電子書格式: EPUB, TXT, PDF.
    * 編輯器支援的語言格式: JSON, HTML, XML, C/C++, Lua, Java, Objective-C, Swift, Python, JavaScript.
    * 支援瀏覽的文件格式: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Numbers, Keynote, Pages, RTF, CSV.

Race across the world through colorful and stylized environments in top-down view.
Compete for first place in the leaderboards with daily and weekly challenges.
Will you master the art of rally?

Experience the golden era of rally in Career mode, traveling across 78 stages from Finland to Sardinia, Norway, Japan, Germany, Kenya and Indonesia.

Get behind the wheel of your favorite vintage cars, ranging from the 60’s to the 80’s, Group B, Group S and Group A.

From beginner-friendly options to driving modes that’ll challenge the most expert drivers, all players can tackle the races using their favorite rally driving tricks: Scandinavian flick, counter steering, left foot braking, handbrake turns.

Get your name out at the top of the Leaderboard in our daily and weekly challenges.

Show off your driving skills, or simply your favourite landscapes, with the integrated Photo and Replay mode.

hk.description:
"轉身離開之前，別忘了說最後一次再見"

從天而降，遺失了過去的少女

指尖下敲響的琴弦之音，

hk.description:
「Cytus II」是雷亞遊戲繼「Cytus」、「Deemo」及「VOEZ」三款全球音樂遊戲排行榜冠軍作品後，由原班人馬傾注全力打造的音樂節奏遊戲續作。


未來，人類重新定義了網路的發展和連線方式，能夠輕易地在現實世界同步存取網路世界，改變了千年以來生活的樣貌。

在巨型精神網路空間cyTus裡，一位來歷不明的傳奇DJ Æsir，其音樂有著讓人為之瘋狂的魅力，每個音符和節拍都能夠深深重擊聽者的靈魂深處。

某日，從未露面的Æsir突然宣布要舉辦第一場大型虛擬音樂祭——Æsir-FEST，邀請了當紅偶像歌手以及人氣DJ作為開場嘉賓。

宣傳公開之際即造成前所未見的討論熱潮，所有人無不想一睹Æsir的真實面貌。

而在音樂祭入場的前一小時，數以千萬計的連線瀏覽次數打破歷史紀錄，整個城市瞬間沸騰了起來，等待Æsir如同天神般的降臨……

遊戲特色：

-獨特動態判定線音樂遊戲玩法
跟隨判定線打擊拍點以獲得高分，透過五種不同特性的拍點及隨節奏動態變化的判定線，讓遊戲過程更貼合音樂，輕鬆融入並沉浸在樂曲之中。

-50首+IAP(額外付費內容)，超越250首最高質量樂曲
本次收錄樂曲涵蓋世界各地如日韓、歐美、台灣等創作者的作品，透過數位角色引領玩家遊玩如電音、搖滾、古典等不同風格之樂曲，是不辜負千萬人期待的自信力作。

-多達800種不同譜面關卡 
設計超過800種由易到難的音樂譜面，豐富的遊戲內容滿足不同等級的玩家，透過指尖的打擊體驗最刺激的挑戰和樂趣。

-與遊戲中的角色們一同進入虛擬的網路世界探險
獨特的故事系統 "iM" 將帶領玩家與遊戲中的角色逐步拼湊出 「Cytus II」背後的劇情脈絡與世界觀，在極富動態的視覺體驗中揭開故事的真實面貌。

mo.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

mo.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

mo.description:
建立足夠強大的骰子組合，淨化阿斯特賴亞失控的腐敗並拯救星系。

特色
• 獨特的雙重「傷害」系統：腐化與淨化——《阿斯特賴亞》有一種新型的「傷害」系統。淨化可以用來傷害敵人或治療自己，而腐化可以用來傷害自己或治療敵人。使用淨化來安撫敵人，或腐化自己來釋放力量以扭轉戰局。
• 動態生命條系統——將技能附加到生命條後，可以使用腐化來啟用這些技能並釋放強大的能力。但是要小心，如果接受了太多腐敗，你可能會被會被它消耗殆盡。
• 不是紙牌，是骰子！——建立適合你遊戲風格的骰子組合。從超過350顆骰子和三種骰子類型中選擇：可靠安全、完美平衡或強大有風險。以高風險、高報酬為核心設計的骰子型系統。
• 自訂骰子——編輯骰子面，以新動作來創造自己的命運，讓強大結果的機率對自己有利。
• 在六位勇敢神諭者中選擇——每一位都擁有自己獨特的骰子組合、能力與玩法風格。從靈巧的施法者到野蠻的狂戰士，無論是喜歡讓對手挨轟求饒，還是想以智取勝，總有一位適合你。
• 發現超過170種修改賜福——為神諭者注入獨特的被動技，產生強大的效果，將改變你的基本策略。在恆星賜福（力量較弱的被動效果）或黑洞賜福（具有不利條件的強大被動效果）之間進行選擇。

mo.description:
Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:
 -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR.

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.
• Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly
• Text Analysis using AI.

►  Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokmål, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

Technology:
New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy,
Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio.

2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere.

3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen!

4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love.

5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app !

mo.description:
- zFuse 可播放所有影片格式和編碼, 您無需將影片檔案轉換為MP4, 即可在行動裝置中進行播放.

- zFuse 支援ASS/SSA/SUP特效字幕, 您可以體驗到與Mac/PC版完全相同的特效字幕效果.

- zFuse 具有強大的網路技術, 您無需將影片檔案儲存在空間有限的裝置中, 可以直接播放電腦或NAS上的各種格式影片, 無需轉換, 無需下載, 即點即播.

- zFuse 支援直接登入多種雲端硬碟, 直接原畫播放內容, 還可以閱讀雲端硬碟中的小說/圖片/原始碼/直播源等, 甚至可以透過iOS版同步到zFuse TV版, 讓您在tvOS中播放雲端硬碟內容.

- zFuse 也可以讓您輕鬆地從電腦/NAS中直接下載檔案/資料夾, 是您旅途中的最佳夥伴.

- zFuse 支援各種手勢操作, 只需動動手指, 即可調整播放位置, 字體大小, 控制音量和亮度.

- zFuse 為您的隱私安全考量, 擁有資料夾加密功能, 讓您不再擔心隱私問題.

- zFuse 還為廣大學子準備了音視頻變速不變調功能, 幫助您快速瀏覽課件.

- zFuse 還包含了一款強大的程式碼/文字編輯器, 支援各種程式語言/語法高亮/數十種編輯器風格等, 您可以用它直接在iPhone/iPad上編輯程式碼.

- zFuse 甚至可以作為一款檔案管理工具, 您可以用它壓縮/解壓縮/瀏覽圖片/閱讀TXT, PDF, EPUB等各種電子書.

- zFuse的詳細特性如下:

    * SMB/CIFS播放/自動發現(輕鬆播放PC上的共享媒體檔案).
    * 直接透過SMB/CIFS/DLNA/FTP/WebDAV下載媒體檔案/資料夾到iOS裝置上.
    * UPnP/DLNA播放/自動發現.
    * Emby和Jellyfin媒體伺服器支援.
    * 客戶端之間可以透過QR Code分享媒體檔案/資料夾.
    * 直接使用PC檔案總管管理媒體資料夾.
    * AirPlay投影播放.
    * 支援子母畫面模式.
    * 支援iPad分割畫面多工.
    * 硬體加速.
    * 支援HDR Tone Mapping以便在非HDR顯示裝置中顯示HDR內容.
    * 支援特效字幕.
    * 0.5x-3.0x播放速度控制.
    * 0.5x-5.0x螢幕縮放.
    * 支援Seeking時預覽媒體內容.
    * 內建音訊增強.
    * 多音軌選擇.
    * 內嵌/外掛字幕選擇.
    * 字幕同步.
    * 音訊同步.
    * 支援外部字幕字型選擇.
    * 播放清單檔案預覽功能.
    * 播放藍光資料夾功能.
    * 直接在裝置上管理和修改播放清單.
    * 直接播放外接USB隨身碟上的媒體檔案.
    * 直播源有效性檢測.
    * 螢幕鏡像.

    * 檔案管理:
        - 刪除, 移動, 重新命名, 建立資料夾.
        - 支援Wi-Fi傳輸, 無需連接USB線即可傳輸檔案.
        - 支援建立串流媒體播放清單.
        - 支援EPUB/TXT閱讀器.
        - 支援解壓縮常見壓縮格式: 7z, zip, rar, tar, bz, bz2等.
        - 支援壓縮常見格式: 7z, zip等.

    * 手勢功能:
        - 水平拖動: 調整播放位置.
        - 在螢幕左側垂直拖動: 調整音量.
        - 在螢幕右側垂直拖動: 調整亮度.
        - 在螢幕上捏合: 螢幕尺寸調整.
        - 雙擊: 播放/暫停.
        - 兩指雙擊: 切換螢幕長寬比.

    * 支援外接鍵盤:
        - 空白鍵: 暫停/播放.
        - 左方向鍵: 快退.
        - 右方向鍵: 快進.
        - 上方向鍵: 增加音量.
        - 下方向鍵: 降低音量.
        - Esc: 退出播放.
        - S: 改變播放速度.
        - B: 上一首.
        - N: 下一首.
        - Z: 改變螢幕縮放.

    * 支援影片格式: MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WMV, FLV, RMVB, ASF, OGV, 藍光ISO等所有常見格式.
    * 支援音訊格式: MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, APE等.
    * 支援字幕格式: SRT, SSA, ASS, SUP, VTT等.
    * 支援圖像格式: JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, GIF, HEIC等.
    * 支援電子書格式: EPUB, TXT, PDF.
    * 編輯器支援的語言格式: JSON, HTML, XML, C/C++, Lua, Java, Objective-C, Swift, Python, JavaScript.
    * 支援瀏覽的文件格式: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Numbers, Keynote, Pages, RTF, CSV.

Race across the world through colorful and stylized environments in top-down view.
Compete for first place in the leaderboards with daily and weekly challenges.
Will you master the art of rally?

Experience the golden era of rally in Career mode, traveling across 78 stages from Finland to Sardinia, Norway, Japan, Germany, Kenya and Indonesia.

Get behind the wheel of your favorite vintage cars, ranging from the 60’s to the 80’s, Group B, Group S and Group A.

From beginner-friendly options to driving modes that’ll challenge the most expert drivers, all players can tackle the races using their favorite rally driving tricks: Scandinavian flick, counter steering, left foot braking, handbrake turns.

Get your name out at the top of the Leaderboard in our daily and weekly challenges.

Show off your driving skills, or simply your favourite landscapes, with the integrated Photo and Replay mode.

mo.description:
「Cytus II」是雷亞遊戲繼「Cytus」、「Deemo」及「VOEZ」三款全球音樂遊戲排行榜冠軍作品後，由原班人馬傾注全力打造的音樂節奏遊戲續作。


未來，人類重新定義了網路的發展和連線方式，能夠輕易地在現實世界同步存取網路世界，改變了千年以來生活的樣貌。

在巨型精神網路空間cyTus裡，一位來歷不明的傳奇DJ Æsir，其音樂有著讓人為之瘋狂的魅力，每個音符和節拍都能夠深深重擊聽者的靈魂深處。

某日，從未露面的Æsir突然宣布要舉辦第一場大型虛擬音樂祭——Æsir-FEST，邀請了當紅偶像歌手以及人氣DJ作為開場嘉賓。

宣傳公開之際即造成前所未見的討論熱潮，所有人無不想一睹Æsir的真實面貌。

而在音樂祭入場的前一小時，數以千萬計的連線瀏覽次數打破歷史紀錄，整個城市瞬間沸騰了起來，等待Æsir如同天神般的降臨……

遊戲特色：

-獨特動態判定線音樂遊戲玩法
跟隨判定線打擊拍點以獲得高分，透過五種不同特性的拍點及隨節奏動態變化的判定線，讓遊戲過程更貼合音樂，輕鬆融入並沉浸在樂曲之中。

-50首+IAP(額外付費內容)，超越250首最高質量樂曲
本次收錄樂曲涵蓋世界各地如日韓、歐美、台灣等創作者的作品，透過數位角色引領玩家遊玩如電音、搖滾、古典等不同風格之樂曲，是不辜負千萬人期待的自信力作。

-多達800種不同譜面關卡 
設計超過800種由易到難的音樂譜面，豐富的遊戲內容滿足不同等級的玩家，透過指尖的打擊體驗最刺激的挑戰和樂趣。

-與遊戲中的角色們一同進入虛擬的網路世界探險
獨特的故事系統 "iM" 將帶領玩家與遊戲中的角色逐步拼湊出 「Cytus II」背後的劇情脈絡與世界觀，在極富動態的視覺體驗中揭開故事的真實面貌。

tw.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

tw.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

tw.description:
建立足夠強大的骰子組合，淨化阿斯特賴亞失控的腐敗並拯救星系。

特色
• 獨特的雙重「傷害」系統：腐化與淨化——《阿斯特賴亞》有一種新型的「傷害」系統。淨化可以用來傷害敵人或治療自己，而腐化可以用來傷害自己或治療敵人。使用淨化來安撫敵人，或腐化自己來釋放力量以扭轉戰局。
• 動態生命條系統——將技能附加到生命條後，可以使用腐化來啟用這些技能並釋放強大的能力。但是要小心，如果接受了太多腐敗，你可能會被會被它消耗殆盡。
• 不是紙牌，是骰子！——建立適合你遊戲風格的骰子組合。從超過350顆骰子和三種骰子類型中選擇：可靠安全、完美平衡或強大有風險。以高風險、高報酬為核心設計的骰子型系統。
• 自訂骰子——編輯骰子面，以新動作來創造自己的命運，讓強大結果的機率對自己有利。
• 在六位勇敢神諭者中選擇——每一位都擁有自己獨特的骰子組合、能力與玩法風格。從靈巧的施法者到野蠻的狂戰士，無論是喜歡讓對手挨轟求饒，還是想以智取勝，總有一位適合你。
• 發現超過170種修改賜福——為神諭者注入獨特的被動技，產生強大的效果，將改變你的基本策略。在恆星賜福（力量較弱的被動效果）或黑洞賜福（具有不利條件的強大被動效果）之間進行選擇。

tw.description:
Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:
 -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR.

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.
・Ideal for both individual and group transcription
・Background support for voice recognition.
・On-device Speech Recognition.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.
• Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly
• Text Analysis using AI.

►  Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokmål, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

Technology:
New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy,
Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio.

2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere.

3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen!

4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love.

5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app !

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

We offer three auto-renewing subscription options:

$1.99 / month

The price corresponds to the same price segment , which are set in the “Apple App Store Matrix” for other currencies

tw.description:
- zFuse 可播放所有影片格式和編碼, 您無需將影片檔案轉換為MP4, 即可在行動裝置中進行播放.

- zFuse 支援ASS/SSA/SUP特效字幕, 您可以體驗到與Mac/PC版完全相同的特效字幕效果.

- zFuse 具有強大的網路技術, 您無需將影片檔案儲存在空間有限的裝置中, 可以直接播放電腦或NAS上的各種格式影片, 無需轉換, 無需下載, 即點即播.

- zFuse 支援直接登入多種雲端硬碟, 直接原畫播放內容, 還可以閱讀雲端硬碟中的小說/圖片/原始碼/直播源等, 甚至可以透過iOS版同步到zFuse TV版, 讓您在tvOS中播放雲端硬碟內容.

- zFuse 也可以讓您輕鬆地從電腦/NAS中直接下載檔案/資料夾, 是您旅途中的最佳夥伴.

- zFuse 支援各種手勢操作, 只需動動手指, 即可調整播放位置, 字體大小, 控制音量和亮度.

- zFuse 為您的隱私安全考量, 擁有資料夾加密功能, 讓您不再擔心隱私問題.

- zFuse 還為廣大學子準備了音視頻變速不變調功能, 幫助您快速瀏覽課件.

- zFuse 還包含了一款強大的程式碼/文字編輯器, 支援各種程式語言/語法高亮/數十種編輯器風格等, 您可以用它直接在iPhone/iPad上編輯程式碼.

- zFuse 甚至可以作為一款檔案管理工具, 您可以用它壓縮/解壓縮/瀏覽圖片/閱讀TXT, PDF, EPUB等各種電子書.

- zFuse的詳細特性如下:

    * SMB/CIFS播放/自動發現(輕鬆播放PC上的共享媒體檔案).
    * 直接透過SMB/CIFS/DLNA/FTP/WebDAV下載媒體檔案/資料夾到iOS裝置上.
    * UPnP/DLNA播放/自動發現.
    * Emby和Jellyfin媒體伺服器支援.
    * 客戶端之間可以透過QR Code分享媒體檔案/資料夾.

    * 支援特效字幕.
    * 0.5x-3.0x播放速度控制.
    * 0.5x-5.0x螢幕縮放.
    * 支援Seeking時預覽媒體內容.
    * 內建音訊增強.

    * 播放藍光資料夾功能.
    * 直接在裝置上管理和修改播放清單.
    * 直接播放外接USB隨身碟上的媒體檔案.
    * 直播源有效性檢測.
    * 螢幕鏡像.

    * 檔案管理:
        - 刪除, 移動, 重新命名, 建立資料夾.
        - 支援Wi-Fi傳輸, 無需連接USB線即可傳輸檔案.
        - 支援建立串流媒體播放清單.
        - 支援EPUB/TXT閱讀器.
        - 支援解壓縮常見壓縮格式: 7z, zip, rar, tar, bz, bz2等.
        - 支援壓縮常見格式: 7z, zip等.

    * 手勢功能:
        - 水平拖動: 調整播放位置.
        - 在螢幕左側垂直拖動: 調整音量.
        - 在螢幕右側垂直拖動: 調整亮度.
        - 在螢幕上捏合: 螢幕尺寸調整.
        - 雙擊: 播放/暫停.
        - 兩指雙擊: 切換螢幕長寬比.

    * 支援外接鍵盤:
        - 空白鍵: 暫停/播放.
        - 左方向鍵: 快退.
        - 右方向鍵: 快進.
        - 上方向鍵: 增加音量.
        - 下方向鍵: 降低音量.
        - Esc: 退出播放.
        - S: 改變播放速度.
        - B: 上一首.
        - N: 下一首.
        - Z: 改變螢幕縮放.

    * 支援影片格式: MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WMV, FLV, RMVB, ASF, OGV, 藍光ISO等所有常見格式.
    * 支援音訊格式: MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, APE等.
    * 支援字幕格式: SRT, SSA, ASS, SUP, VTT等.
    * 支援圖像格式: JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, GIF, HEIC等.
    * 支援電子書格式: EPUB, TXT, PDF.
    * 編輯器支援的語言格式: JSON, HTML, XML, C/C++, Lua, Java, Objective-C, Swift, Python, JavaScript.
    * 支援瀏覽的文件格式: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Numbers, Keynote, Pages, RTF, CSV.

Race across the world through colorful and stylized environments in top-down view.

Get your name out at the top of the Leaderboard in our daily and weekly challenges.

tw.description:
「Cytus II」是雷亞遊戲繼「Cytus」、「Deemo」及「VOEZ」三款全球音樂遊戲排行榜冠軍作品後，由原班人馬傾注全力打造的音樂節奏遊戲續作。


未來，人類重新定義了網路的發展和連線方式，能夠輕易地在現實世界同步存取網路世界，改變了千年以來生活的樣貌。

在巨型精神網路空間cyTus裡，一位來歷不明的傳奇DJ Æsir，其音樂有著讓人為之瘋狂的魅力，每個音符和節拍都能夠深深重擊聽者的靈魂深處。

某日，從未露面的Æsir突然宣布要舉辦第一場大型虛擬音樂祭——Æsir-FEST，邀請了當紅偶像歌手以及人氣DJ作為開場嘉賓。

宣傳公開之際即造成前所未見的討論熱潮，所有人無不想一睹Æsir的真實面貌。

而在音樂祭入場的前一小時，數以千萬計的連線瀏覽次數打破歷史紀錄，整個城市瞬間沸騰了起來，等待Æsir如同天神般的降臨……

遊戲特色：

-獨特動態判定線音樂遊戲玩法
跟隨判定線打擊拍點以獲得高分，透過五種不同特性的拍點及隨節奏動態變化的判定線，讓遊戲過程更貼合音樂，輕鬆融入並沉浸在樂曲之中。

-50首+IAP(額外付費內容)，超越250首最高質量樂曲
本次收錄樂曲涵蓋世界各地如日韓、歐美、台灣等創作者的作品，透過數位角色引領玩家遊玩如電音、搖滾、古典等不同風格之樂曲，是不辜負千萬人期待的自信力作。

-多達800種不同譜面關卡 
設計超過800種由易到難的音樂譜面，豐富的遊戲內容滿足不同等級的玩家，透過指尖的打擊體驗最刺激的挑戰和樂趣。

-與遊戲中的角色們一同進入虛擬的網路世界探險
獨特的故事系統 "iM" 將帶領玩家與遊戲中的角色逐步拼湊出 「Cytus II」背後的劇情脈絡與世界觀，在極富動態的視覺體驗中揭開故事的真實面貌。

us.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

us.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

us.description:
Astrea is a DICE-deck-building roguelike that flips the script on deckbuilders by using dice instead of cards and an unique dual “damage” system: Purification vs Corruption.

Features

• Unique dual “damage” system: Purification vs Corruption - In Astrea there is a new type of “damage” system. Purification can be used to damage enemies or heal yourself. On the other hand, corruption can be used to damage yourself or heal the enemies. Pacify enemies through Purification, or Corrupt yourself to unleash abilities that help tip the scales.
• Dynamic Health Bar system - With skills attached to your health bar, you can take Corruption to enable these skills and unleash powerful abilities. But be careful, if you take too much Corruption you will be consumed by it.
• Not cards, but dice! - Build a dice pool that fits your playstyle. Choose from over 350 dice and three dice types; reliably safe, perfectly balanced, or powerfully risky. A dice type system designed with high-risk, high-reward in its core.
• Customize your dice - Forge your fate by editing die faces with new actions, tipping the odds of powerful results into your favor.
• Choose from Six Brave Oracles - Each possessing their own unique dice sets, abilities, and playstyles. From ingenious spellcasters to brutish berserkers, whether you like beating the opponent into submission or outsmarting them with clever plays, there’s an oracle for you.
• Uncover over 170 modifying Blessings - Imbue your Oracle with unique passives yielding potent effects that changes up your fundamental tactics. Choose between Star Blessings, passive effects with lower power, or Black Hole Blessings, powerful passive effects with a drawback.

With this application, you can make automatic calls to the numbers you want efficiently and in a personalized way. You can define the number of repetitions, the interval between calls, add an extension, activate vibration before dialing, and even schedule your calls using a built-in calendar. Auto Redial App also offers a simple and intuitive interface, detailed call history, and multiple customization options to fit your needs.

This application is ideal for anyone who needs to make repetitive calls automatically — such as an appointment call, a busy call retry, or contacting services where the line is busy.

Version 1.16: Preparation for AI support to help you improve your results, plus sharing to TikTok.

Version 1.14: Improvements with volume on bluetooth headsets but also improvements for those without headsets as well as some communication tweaks.

Version 1.13: We've made some minor improvements to compatibility and communications.

Version 1.8: MASSIVE UPDATE: An even better experience with better sounds and audio using Apple AirPods or bluetooth headphones. The results are incredible, and using bluetooth headphones the sounds remove the chances of false positives. The app switches automatically to headphones once they are connected. We'd love to hear your recordings so please share with us on Facebook or Instagram.

Version 1.5: We're constantly improving Hear My Baby to make it easier for you to achieve results. We're here to help, and keen to constantly improve HMB for you.

 In this update:

- We have fixed an audio bug that occasionally causes the app to crash.

us.description:
Pregnant? This is for YOU!
Hear My Baby is the leading app allowing you to use just your iPhone microphone to record and share your baby’s heart sounds. It is the best-in-class, has 5000 5* ratings, is super simple and safe to use. Amazing with Apple Airpods and Bluetooth Headphones. Great support!

"It took some time and patience... thank you for creating this cheap, awesome technology to use at home." - Niki
"I was skeptical at first. Great app! Worth it." - Legretta 

Hear My Baby Heartbeat is Category #1 in the USA and 102 other countries since 2018 with over 500,000 downloads and multi-millions of recordings. Here's why:

Developed by parents like you (with expertise in sound engineering and app development) who wanted a trustworthy, safe and easy-to-use way to record our baby's fetal sounds (kicks, heart beat etc.) - and keep a record of a quality that we hadn't been able to find before in other apps. With over 500,000 downloads it has been extensively tested on expectant mothers.

**** But honestly, does it actually work?? ****
Yes. We've sound-engineered Hear My Baby to isolate the baby's heart beat, heart sound (kicks, heartbeat and more) and using an advanced algorithm, amplify them making them easier to detect and hear.

NOTE: It takes time, technique and patience and depends on the position and number of weeks of your baby so you'll need to stick with it. When you do, our results are excellent. Only try from 16 weeks best results around 27 weeks.

We want you to be happy with Hear My Baby heartbeat and getting results can sometimes be difficult.  If you are struggling (can't find your own heartbeat etc.) DO contact us via support. We constantly improve our tutorial to handhold you through use.

GIFT THIS APP: Click the “Buy App” arrow on the iTunes® App Store

FAQs

**** No Accessories Required ****
We use the internal microphone from your phone to attempt to listen and record your baby heart sounds. We recommend Bluetooth Headphones for best results.

**** How It Works ****
1. Hear My Baby, has been precisely engineered to listen to abdominal sounds, then record and amplify them. Listen to your own heartbeat first to confirm the app is set up correctly. 
2. It works best when baby is head down and their back is facing forwards.
3. Remove the case, be in a very quiet room and focus on your lower abdomen.
4. Our simple recording management helps you to keep a record of their special beat
5. Take a selfie if you wish and share 
6. We'll walk you through exactly how to get the best baby heartbeat results

**** Easy Share Feature ****
Sharing is awesome you can opt to share via Facebook, Whats App, Instagram or email.

**** We Care About Your Privacy ****
We take your privacy and special moment seriously. You decide who sees or hears it and can delete it at any time.

**** Before you start... ****
You DO need to carefully follow the instructions for Hear My Baby to work. A quiet room is critical for results as the mic is super sensitive. Hear My Baby doesn't fake the baby heartbeat or other fetal sounds :) 

Please Note: results are normally superb, however the recording may not work if your placenta is at the front of the tummy or the baby is in the wrong position.

**** Supported Phones ****
All iPhones. We don't support iPad.

**** Worried about safety? We are too! ***
HMB is safe but to be extra sure DO switch your iPhone to airplane mode. This is a precaution and automatically stops all cellular transmissions.

**** Is it a substitute for medical devices/support? ****
No - Hear My Baby Heartbeat monitor is not a substitute for medical support - if you don't get a result it doesn't mean anything is wrong :)- Consult your doctor for any advice. We are NOT approved by the FDA or any medical authority. This is not a medical device and is not a medical baby heartbeat monitor or baby doppler.

Please do check our T&Cs before downloading.

For results examples: www.facebook.com/hearmybaby
www.instagram.com/hearmybabyapp

us.description:
RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities.

Whether you’re scanning for a mesocyclone’s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane’s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar’s scanning strategy.

Your initial app purchase includes the following:

• Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany
• 6-frame radar loops
• Two built-in providers for radar data
• Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US
• Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia
• NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes
• Inspector and distance tools
• Color palette options for radar data
• AllisonHouse data plan integration
• Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting
• mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL
• Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use
• Support for widgets and complications
• Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather:

• 30-frame radar loops
• Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes
• Severe weather watches in the US and Canada
• Special weather statements in the US and Canada
• Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions
• SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks
• WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US
• Local storm reports in the US
• Custom color palette support
• Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices)
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including:

• Everything in Pro Tier One
• 50-frame radar loops
• A third provider for US radar data
• NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive
• Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive
• Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive
• GOES East and GOES West satellite products
• NSSL’s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products
• NCEP’s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products
• Surface observations
• Atmospheric soundings in the US
• Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive
• More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps
• Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA
• Server-sent events for radar and warning updates
• Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices
• Family sharing support

If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period.

DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/

Please visit our web site for more information.

us.description:
- zFuse can play all video formats and encodings, allowing you to play video files on your mobile device without the need to convert to MP4.

- zFuse supports ASS/SSA/SUP effect subtitles, enabling you to experience full subtitle effects just like on your PC/Mac.

- zFuse features powerful networking technologies that allow you to play media from your PC or NAS directly, without occupying any space on your limited device storage and without needing to download anything.

- zFuse also allows you to easily download files or directories directly from your PC or NAS, making it the perfect companion for your trips.

- zFuse supports a variety of gestures - simply move your fingers to adjust playback position, font size, volume, and brightness.

- zFuse carefully protects your privacy with folder encryption, so you no longer need to worry about privacy issues.

- zFuse's detailed features include:

    * SMB/CIFS playback and discovery (easily play media files from your PC).
    * Download media files or directories from SAMBA/DLNA/WebDAV/FTP directly.
    * UPnP/DLNA playback and discovery.
    * Emby and Jellyfin media server support.
    * AirPlay playback.
    * Picture-in-Picture mode support.
    * iPad split-screen multitasking support.
    * Hardware acceleration.
    * HDR Tone Mapping support on non-HDR displays.
    * Subtitle effects support.
    * 0.5x-3.0x playback speed control.
    * 0.5x-5.0x screen zoom.
    * Media preview while seeking.
    * Built-in audio enhancement.
    * Multi-soundtrack selection.
    * Embedded/external subtitle track selection.
    * Subtitle synchronization.
    * Audio synchronization.
    * External subtitle font selection support.
    * Playlist file preview before playback.
    * Blu-ray directory playback.
    * Real-time playlist management and editing.
    * Screen mirroring.

    * File Management:
        - Delete, move, rename, create folders.
        - Wi-Fi file transfer support without USB cable connection.
        - Streaming media playlist creation support.
        - File decompression support: 7z, zip, rar, tar, bz, bz2, etc.
    
    * Gesture Controls:
        - Horizontal drag: adjust playback position.
        - Vertical drag on left side: adjust volume.
        - Vertical drag on right side: adjust brightness.
        - Pinch to zoom: adjust screen size.
        - Double-tap: play/pause.
        - Two-finger double-tap: change video aspect ratio.

    * External Keyboard Support:
         - Space: pause/play.
         - Left Arrow: backward seek.
         - Right Arrow: forward seek.
         - Esc: exit playback.
         - S: change playback speed.
         - B: play previous.
         - N: play next.
         - Z: change screen scale.
    
    * Supported Video Formats: MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WMV, FLV, RMVB, ASF, OGV, Blu-ray ISO and more.
    * Supported Audio Formats: MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, APE and more.
    * Supported Subtitle Formats: SRT, SSA, ASS, SUP, VTT.
    * Supported Image Formats: JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, GIF, HEIC and more.
    * Supported eBook Formats: EPUB, TXT, PDF.
    * Code Editor Supported Languages: JSON, HTML, XML, C/C++, Lua, Java, Objective-C, Swift, Python, JavaScript.
    * Supported Document Formats: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Numbers, Keynote, Pages, RTF, CSV.

Race across the world through colorful and stylized environments in top-down view.
Compete for first place in the leaderboards with daily and weekly challenges.
Will you master the art of rally?

Experience the golden era of rally in Career mode, traveling across 78 stages from Finland to Sardinia, Norway, Japan, Germany, Kenya and Indonesia.

Get behind the wheel of your favorite vintage cars, ranging from the 60’s to the 80’s, Group B, Group S and Group A.

From beginner-friendly options to driving modes that’ll challenge the most expert drivers, all players can tackle the races using their favorite rally driving tricks: Scandinavian flick, counter steering, left foot braking, handbrake turns.

Get your name out at the top of the Leaderboard in our daily and weekly challenges.

us.description:
"Never Left Without Saying Goodbye."

The world acclaimed, mobile rhythm game that's touched over 10 million players. Created by the team that brought you Cytus, the original Rayark team has created a whole new texture to the piano rhythm game DEEMO.

A girl who fell from the skies and lost her past;
Deemo, who plays the piano all alone in the world of the treehouse;
an accidental encounter between the two.
The music flows as the fingers hit the piano keys.
The start of a fairytale journey has begun...

Game Features:
-60+ free songs in story mode, including more than 220 songs 
-Unlock more tracks as the game progresses, experience a story that will move you
-Accompany Deemo and engage with this stunning, modern fairytale
-Plenty of original piano songs in various music genres, many composed by famous composers from around the world 
-Simple and intuitive gameplay, experience touching emotion through music 
-Through tapping and sliding, follow the rhythm to play along
-Explore the scenes, piece together the clues, and obtain hidden in-game elements

us.description:
"Cytus II" is a music rhythm game created by Rayark Games. It's our fourth rhythm game title, following the footsteps of three global successes, "Cytus", "DEEMO" and "VOEZ". This sequel to "Cytus" brings back the original staff and is a product of hardwork and devotion. 

In the future, humans have redefined internet development and connections. We can now easily sync the real world with the internet world, changing life as we have known for thousands of years. 

In the mega virtual internet space cyTus, there exists a mysterious DJ legend Æsir. His music has an irresistible charm; people fall madly in love with his music. Rumor has it that every note and beat of his music hits the audiences in 
the depths of their souls. 

One day, Æsir, who had never shown his face before, suddenly announced that he will be holding the first mega virtual concert —— Æsir-FEST and will invite a top idol singer and a popular DJ as opening performances. The instant the ticket sales began, an unprecedented rush occurred. Everyone wanted to see Æsir's real face. 

On the day of the FEST,  millions of people were connected to the event. At one hour before the event started,  the previous world record for most simultaneous connection was smashed. The whole city was on its feet, waiting for Æsir to descent from the skies...

Game Features:

- The unique "Active Judgement Line" rhythm game playstyle
Tap the notes as the judgement line hits them to achieve a high score. Through five different kinds of notes and the judgement line that actively adjusts its speed according to the beat, the gameplay experience is further combined with the music. Players can easily immerse themselves in the songs. 

- A total of 250+ high-quality songs (50+ in base game, 200+ as IAP)
The game includes songs by composers from all across the world, Japan, Korea, the US, Europe, Taiwan and more. Through the characters, players get to play songs from different genres including but not limited to: electronic, rock and classical. We are confident that this game will live up to the hype and expectations.

- Over 800 different charts
Over 800 different charts designed, from easy to hard. The rich game content can satisfy players of different levels. Experience exciting challenges and enjoyment through the sensation of your fingertips. 

- Explore the virtual internet world with the game's characters
The one-of-a-kind story system "iM" will lead the players and the in-game characters to slowly piece together the story and world behind "Cytus II". Reveal the truth of the story with a rich, cinematic visual experience. 

PAFF (CV:上坂すみれ Sumire Uesaka)
NEKO (CV:花守ゆみり Yumiri Hanamori)
Xenon (CV:関智一 Tomokazu Seki)
ConneR (CV:竹内栄治 Eiji Takeuchi)

us.description:
Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community.

tr.description:
1984 kitabından esinlenen distopik bir hayatta kalma deneyimi.

Aylık Distopya'da diktatörlük ile yönetilen bir dünyada hayatta kalmaya çalışacaksın. İyi bir yurttaş olarak diktatörlüğe hizmet edebilir ya da direniş ile işbirliği yaparak ülkeden kaçmaya çalışabilirsin. Aşkın yasak olduğu, partinin istemediği sözcüklerin cezasının idam olduğu bir yönetim altında yaşıyorsun. Fikir suçlusu olmamak için konuştuğun kelimeleri iyi seçmelisin. Unutma seni her an izleyen bir ekran var. Bakanlıktaki işinde geçmişi değiştirerek kazandığın para hayatta kalacak erzağı almana zar zor yeterken, düşünmenin bile yasak olduğu bu dünyadan kaçmanın bir yolunu bulmalısın.

Sadık bir yurttaş gibi hizmet edebilir, yakalanma korkusu ile aşık olabilir, direniş ile diktatörlüğe karşı çalışabilir, özgürlük ya da tutsaklık için seçimler yapabilirsin. 

Dairende yaptığın günlük işlerin hayatta kalmanın tek yolu olduğunu bilmelisin, erzağının yanında zaman da kısıtlı bir kaynak. Bakanlıkta ki işine gitmeden önce yemek yapmak, hastalığın için ilaç içmek ya da psikolojine iyi gelecek şeyler yapmak arasında tercihler yapman gerekecek. 

Vicdan ile kararlar vererek tanıdığın insanları korumayı dene ya da yaşadığın distopyadan kurtulmak için onları arkanda bırak.

tr.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

tr.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

tr.description:
Astrea is a DICE-deck-building roguelike that flips the script on deckbuilders by using dice instead of cards and an unique dual “damage” system: Purification vs Corruption.

Features

• Unique dual “damage” system: Purification vs Corruption - In Astrea there is a new type of “damage” system. Purification can be used to damage enemies or heal yourself. On the other hand, corruption can be used to damage yourself or heal the enemies. Pacify enemies through Purification, or Corrupt yourself to unleash abilities that help tip the scales.
• Dynamic Health Bar system - With skills attached to your health bar, you can take Corruption to enable these skills and unleash powerful abilities. But be careful, if you take too much Corruption you will be consumed by it.
• Not cards, but dice! - Build a dice pool that fits your playstyle. Choose from over 350 dice and three dice types; reliably safe, perfectly balanced, or powerfully risky. A dice type system designed with high-risk, high-reward in its core.
• Customize your dice - Forge your fate by editing die faces with new actions, tipping the odds of powerful results into your favor.
• Choose from Six Brave Oracles - Each possessing their own unique dice sets, abilities, and playstyles. From ingenious spellcasters to brutish berserkers, whether you like beating the opponent into submission or outsmarting them with clever plays, there’s an oracle for you.
• Uncover over 170 modifying Blessings - Imbue your Oracle with unique passives yielding potent effects that changes up your fundamental tactics. Choose between Star Blessings, passive effects with lower power, or Black Hole Blessings, powerful passive effects with a drawback.

tr.description:
Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?
